creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: envelope-style bag with folded-over top; short strap; tassels at bottom corners; red tie closures with black and brown tassels; tan with vertical bands--red bands with stylized figures and birds and linear brown and red bands
dimension:
16 1/2 x 14 in. (41.91 x 35.56 cm) (flattened, without strap)
30 in. (76.2 cm) (object part, length of strap)
title: Bag
